price: Mwenyezi Mungu, Mola Mlezi wenu na Mola Mlezi wa baba zenu wa zamani?.
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu amekuumbeni na amekuhifadhini nyinyi na baba zenu wa zamani. Yeye basi ndiye Mwenye haki ya kuabudiwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
